question: What is the purpose of establishing KIOXIA Iwate Corporation?
label: The purpose of establishing KIOXIA Iwate Corporation is to meet the growing demand for flash memory by leveraging advanced manufacturing processes that utilize AI.

question: When did Kioxia start operating its new fabrication facility (Fab7)?
label: According to the text, Kioxia started operating its new fabrication facility (Fab7) in the fall of 2022.
